title: Air Conditioning, Ten minutes to downtown Redmond
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1134 Sq.
Here at the Yarrowood Highlands we feature sophisticated and spacious two and three bedroom floor plans within our connected Bellevue community.
Our homes are in a serene neighborhood, surrounded by lush green spaces and located near the Kirkland Waterfront, with a conducive amount of walking space and pet relief area.
Whether you are ready to relax or recharge, an abundance of amenities and activities can be found right outside your front door.
Unwind on your personal patio or balcony, take a bike ride through nearby Watershed Park or take a dip in our resort-style pool and spa.
Choose style seamlessly blended with luxury, and make your move to Yarrowood Highlands today.

Cozy, In-Suite Fireplace*, Personal Patios and Balconies*, Air Conditioning, Marble Entry Foyers*, Two- and Three-Bedroom Residences, Wood-Style Flooring in Kitchens*, Open-Concept Living Areas, Granite Countertops Throughout, Maple-Wood Cabinetry

Fifteen minutes to downtown Seattle, Five minutes to downtown Kirkland, Ten minutes to downtown Redmond, Relaxing Spa, Twenty minutes to downtown Seattle, Resort-Inspired Pool, Community Playground, Online Rent Payments and Service Requests, Marble Entry Foyers*, Professional On-Site Management
